main.name: Juan Mario Parra D'Errico
main.bio: Juan Parra is a passionate about automating processes, scaling systems, and building secure, reliable cloud solutions. What drives me most is seeing how well-designed infrastructure empowers entire teams to move faster, safer, and with greater confidence. passionate about automating processes, scaling systems, and building secure, reliable cloud solutions. main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me for a project request.

education.description: Develop applications in web environments under the Front end and Back end approach for the development of dynamic websites with updated technological tools.

trained for the diagnosis of information needs in organizations and the design and implementation of automated systems aimed at providing, in a reliable and timely manner, the information required for decision making at the tactical, strategic and operational levels

work.title: DevOps Developer
work.description: Automate CI/CD: Integration tests and deployment was manual so my next task was to automate this process using GitHub Actions/Jenkins and introduce tools such as Docker to improve development experience. Assisting in managing and maintaining version control systems like Git. Assisting in troubleshooting and resolving issues related deployments, or operations. Look for improvements to the code. Create new components from previous ones to have a more organized. Develop project concepts and maintain optimal workflow. Work with senior developer to manage large, complex design project corporate clients. Solve issues spotted by the QA team.

work.title: Freelancer FullStack Developer
work.description: specialist on web developing ground and got a profound knowledge of doing anything related to this platform. Also, I have got an impressive urgency of learning and gaining new skills and knowledge with total ease.

testimonials.text: Juan Mario is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Juan Mario has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
